title: Nobody else does what we do.
text: CryptoYC, a Blockchain investor & incubator , invested in Basic Technology , DeFi , Web3 , Privacy Asset , etc . We have developed a Blockchain Technical Due Diligence system — CryptoYC Benchmark to provide Blockchain consulting services for institutional and individual investors .
3:
Zhen Li
Founder and CEO
2014: Investment focus from TMT to bitcoin
2015-2016: Investment in early Blockchain projects; Organization of over 200 Blockchain events; Financing over 12 Mio. RMB to institutions
2017: Founder of CryptoYC
4:
Singfong Sam
Co-founder and COO
IT engineer at different Fortune 500 multinational companies
2012 Founder of a Management Consultancy, with customers as TOTO , MK, TESLA ect.
2015 Investment in bitcoin
2017 Co-founder of CryptoYC

Co-founder and
VP in Singapore

2014: Investment in bitcoin
2015: Investor in several bitcoin projects

European Business Development

14:

Desingner
He is the best designer！
15:
Moke
Founder&CEO of Hchain Labs
Partner of ICO.com
Mr.Lin. MSc in Enterprise Economics in Germany, founder&CEO of HChain Labs, has been an active investor in the blockchain industry since 2013. During the past few years, Hcahin Capital, the investment wing of HChain Capital, has incubated, invested in or participated in dozens of high-profile projects. The list includes ICO.com，TKN.com, JinNiu.cn, Investment.cn, BFS, Quintar.com. Delphy, Sacy, Primas, Cybex, Massgrid,Skycoin, RChain, Emotiq, Polkadot, Cetik…
16:
Eric
Doctor of Physics in Germany.
Research expert in laser and semi-conductor.
Stepped into blockchain industry since 2013, and has accumulated lots of experience in semi-conductor, crypto-currency and blockchain.
Good at industry analysis.
Joined China’s earliest crypto-currency project ZCCoin in 2013.
Early participant of HiveChain Labs.
17:
Heng Wang
Worked in the biggest investment bank of France Natixis, and US top consulting company A.T.Kearney
Now working in the World Top 500 finance group Macquarie Capital Group
Provided fund management service for China Investment Corporation, Paris Bank and other institutional investors.
22:
JianMing Liu
Founder&Chief Saientist of HChain Labs
Parter of ICO.com
Dr.Liu, alumnus of Tsinghua University and University of Missouri-Rolla, former head of technology at renowned Silicon Valley companies, full-stack engineer in AI as well as VLSI design, is the co-founder and chief scientist of HChain Labs.
In 2013, Dr.Liu led the development of ZCCoin and BiChai, one of the first cryptocurrencies and hardware wallets in China.
23:
Matt Kim

Grace
Bachelor and Master of Business Engineering

25:
Pengfei Yin
Investment Director
In 2013-2019, he was mainly engaged in investment in medical devices and IoT while he has further research on the application of blockchain in the medical and IoT .
He also has rich experience in business model analysis and internal process control construction.
